name: Tag All Bot
description: A telegram bot that tags all the users in a group.

TOKEN.description: Bot API Key from BotFather https://t.me/BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram ID of the bot owner.

WEBHOOK.description: Set to any value if you want to use Webhooks.

SUDO_USERS.description: Space separated list of user_ids that can use the bot everywhere.

SUDO_GROUPS.description: Space separated list of group_ids that are considered sudo.

DND_USERS.description: Space separated list of user_ids that will not be tagged by the bot.
